verbose_text: TGF-beta was originally recognized as a growth factor for non immune cells and only later as an inhibitory signal for activation of immune cells, preventing activation of macrophages and maturation of DC and modulating effector functions of T and B cells.
evidence: TGF-beta was originally recognized as a growth factor for non-immune cells and only later as an inhibitory signal for activation of immune cells, preventing activation of macrophages and maturation of DC
